body: "Just wait another week and you will realize that the Lebanese Resistance is playing ATARI with Israel “defense forces”."  Adonis quotes Samir Kuntar's response to the warden, at Hadarim prison, who was boasting that Hezbollah will be crushed in a couple of days during the 2006 war. Kuntar was released from Israeli jails after 28 years. Adonis posts excerpts of Kuntar's new book.

Kuntar was released from Israeli jails after 28 years. Adonis posts excerpts of Kuntar's new book.
title: Lebanon: Kuntar Remembers Prison Days in Israel

sentence: "Just wait another week and you will realize that the Lebanese Resistance is playing ATARI with Israel “defense forces”."
Adonis quotes Samir Kuntar's response to the warden, at Hadarim prison, who was boasting that Hezbollah will be crushed in a couple of days during the 2006 war.
Kuntar was released from Israeli jails after 28 years.
Adonis posts excerpts of Kuntar's new book.
